Sentece: The pharmacokinetics characteristics of BEX were detected, and the results showed that the absolute bioavailability and the cerebral concentration of BEX in rats administrated with 2BEX-LIG were enhanced from 22.89% to 42.86% and increased by 3.4-fold, respectively, compared with those in rats administrated an equivalent of BEX.
Title: A Novel Co-Crystal of Bexarotene and Ligustrazine Improves Pharmacokinetics and Tissue Distribution of Bexarotene in SD Rats.
Name: Bexarotene

Sentece: Compound 7, a tetrazolone of the anti-hypertensive drug, telmisartan 6, was shown to be a potent AT1 antagonist (Kb = 0.14 nM), with activity comparable to telmisartan itself (Kb = 0.44 nM).
